thanks!

Tanya Simpson

----- Original Message -----
From: mc1mommy@...
To: Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com
Sent: Monday, August 19, 2002 9:55 AM
Subject: [Unschooling-dotcom] window writing


Hi,
I wasn't ignoring you, I just had to sleep on it. Literally. Last night
when I was dozing off I thought of this. How about putting un words on your
windows, and then, like someone suggested, you could add "for more info about
unschooling call...."
Some suggestions:
unwind
unleash
unrestrained
understand (not a true un word, but good enough)
unforbidden
unhindered
unencumbered
unlock
uncover
unfold
unearth
unafraid
unlimited
unhurried
undisturbed
unending

Mary J

Yahoo! Groups Sponsor
